name: Fur Ball!
description:
Settle the rivalry once and for all with a game of Fur Ball! Choose between the Cobalt Canines or Fuchsia Felines to decide who is truly man's best friend in a fast paced chase game, going through your choice of 5 unique levels. 

This is a project made specifically for an arcade cabinet, so the controls will reflect the mapping programmed into that cabinet. However, this game can be played with a keyboard. Follow this guide for when the screen prompts certain buttons:

Button

Player 1

Player 2

Button 1

Space Bar

Alphanumeric 4

Button 2

V

Alphanumeric 5

Button 3

B

Alphanumeric 6

Button 4

Z

Alphanumeric 7

Button 5

X

Alphanumeric 8

Player 1 also uses WASD for movement in the levels, while Player 2 uses the arrow keys. You can press the Escape key to exit the game at any point.

Credits:

All Art by Pierre Padilla 

Level Design by Pierre Padilla

Coding by Ronan Cords

UI by Ronan Cords

This is a project made for class in Fitchburg State University's Game Design Major.
